section.title: NumPy
section.para: NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.

section.title: 随机种子
section.para: np.random.seed(1) 两次产生的随机数相同
section.programlisting:
import numpy as np np.random.seed(1)
L1 = np.random.randn(3, 3) L2 = np.random.randn(3, 3) print(L1) print(L2)

section.title: 随机矩阵数组
section.para: 生成随机浮点矩阵数组
section.programlisting: import numpy as np number = np.random.rand(10, 5) print(number)

section.title: 生成随机整数矩阵数组
section.programlisting:
import numpy as np
np.random.seed(1) x = np.random.randint(0,255,(5,6,3)) print(x)

section.title: 生成数列
section.para: 从0 到 100，间隔为10的数值序列
section.programlisting:
n = np.linspace(start = 0, stop = 100, num = 11)
x = np.linspace(-3, 3, 50)

section.title: 查看矩阵或者数组的维度
section.programlisting:
import numpy as np
np.random.seed(1) matrix = np.random.randint(0,255,(5,6,3)) print(matrix.shape)

section.title: 数组维度
section.programlisting: from numpy import array a = array([[1,1],[1,2],[1,3],[1,4]]) print(a.shape)

section.title: 显示数据类型
section.programlisting:
import numpy
numpy.random.seed(1) matrix = numpy.random.randint(0,255,(5,6,3)) print(matrix.dtype)

section.title: 转换数据类型
section.programlisting:
import numpy
numpy.random.seed(1) matrix = numpy.random.randint(0,255,(5,6,3)) print(matrix.dtype)
matrix1 = matrix.astype(np.int8) print(matrix1.dtype)

section.title: 显示矩阵
section.programlisting:
import numpy from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
numpy.random.seed(1) matrix = numpy.random.randint(0,255,(5,6,3)) print(matrix.shape) plt.imshow(matrix)
